title: A Lush Triangle
description: A Lush Triangle - The Prequel to A Lush Betrayal**prequel novelette to A Lush Betrayal**TRIGGER WARNING: This story contains infidelity. It does not glorify it, nor does it condone it. It does not have an HEA.Sometimes love is messy, and sometimes the people you love are a mess.Joss Jamison is a rock star. But he’s a lonely one. His whole world has narrowed to his band, his best friend, and Tammy, his best friend’s fiancé. They love him, and he loves them, but remember, sometimes love is messy.This is a story about three people trying to find their way, trying to survive heartbreak, and trying to overcome very human mistakes.This is the story of the night it all went wrong.
author: Selena Laurence
